nodes.text: The Mynock II virus was a computer virus modified by Faerz Waleth of Nebula Consumables during the Galactic Civil War. It was modified from the original Mynock virus, and used to infect Gryseium Incorporated's facilities on Sprawl 18 of the planet Tyed Kant. This both ended the threat of the Mynock virus, and wreaked revenge on that virus's designers.
